page.title: 13PARK PLAZA
page.content:
Noise levels were controlled. A fractured gas main caused a small explosion - no one was hurt.
PARK PLAZA REDEVELOPMENT INQUIRY
The Park Plaza is a Â£55m redevelopment with glass canopy, intended for the top of the AlM tunnel. Inside it will have an ice rink, hotel and swimming pool, leisure and activities shops and garden centre. When we did a small local survey of what people wanted they replied 'ice rink, disco, shops and evening entertainment because there is a local need'. When we wrote a musical masque about the Park Plaza for a national competition we found that Stevenage, Welwyn Garden City, St. Albans, and some local traders feared loss of trade which caused an official inquiry to be set up.
